'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This small cave is the hiding place of [Warchief Rauki](/warchiefRauki/) and his cohorts.

## Points of interest

* The area is small, with many xaurips. However, wiping them out should pose no real problem.
* Locked up in a cage on the left is [Mother Sharp-Rock](/motherSharpRock/), a xaurip who, if treated nicely, can be recruited as a ship crew member. Doing so will improve the Watcher's reputation with [Edér](/ederTeylecg/) (Animal Kindness).
* On the island, the Ruined Tower to the southeast appears to reliably yield a random grimoire ([Spellwright's Grimoire](/spellwrightsGrimoire/), [Elementalist Grimoire](/elementalistGrimoire/), [Grimoire of Disruption](/grimoireOfDisruption/), [Weathermage Grimoire](/weathermageGrimoire/), [Battle-worn Grimoire](/battleWornGrimoireDeadfire/), perhaps others -- please add to this list).

## Characters

* [Warchief Rauki](/warchiefRauki/)
* [Mother Sharp-Rock](/motherSharpRock/), a xaurip locked up in a cage, and a recruitable crew member.

## Loot

* [Shimmer Scale](/shimmerScale/): Dropped by the warchief.
